simbench

collision simulator benchmark for robotics applications: RaiSim vs Bullet vs ODE vs MuJoCo vs Dart

View on GitHub

Simbench

Overview

Simbench is the project for benchmarking rigid body simulation with contacts.

The list of the simulators benchmarked is as follows:

  • RaiSim by Jemin Hwangbo, Dongho Kang et al.
  • Bullet Physics by Erwin Coumans
  • Open Dynamics Engine by Russell Smith
  • Multi-Joint dynamics with Contact (a.k.a. MuJoCo) by Emanuel Todorov
  • DART Sim

Test results

  • Rolling test
  • ANYmal test
simbench is maintained by eastskykang. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
